statements: SELECT * FROM game_telemetry_data;
SELECT player_id, event_type FROM game_telemetry_data WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM game_telemetry_data ORDER BY event_type DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_timestamp, ST_AsText(player_location) AS Location FROM game_telemetry_data WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(DISTINCT game_session_id) AS num_sessions FROM game_telemetry_data GROUP BY player_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT game_session_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM game_telemetry_data WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, player_id FROM game_telemetry_data WHERE game_session_id = '87654321-12d3-45e6-bc9b-426614174000' LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT event_type FROM game_telemetry_data WHERE ST_DWithin(player_location, 'POINT(1 1)', 10) AND event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_events FROM game_telemetry_data GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_events > 5;
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS num_events FROM game_telemetry_data WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' GROUP BY event_type ORDER BY num_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_stats WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, game_duration FROM game_stats ORDER BY game_duration DESC;
SELECT MAX(fps_avg) AS max_fps FROM game_stats;
SELECT player_id, AVG(memory_usage) AS avg_memory FROM game_stats GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM game_stats WHERE game_duration > 60;
SELECT player_id, AVG(memory_usage) AS avg_memory_usage FROM game_stats GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY avg_memory_usage DESC;
SELECT game_id, player_id, game_duration, fps_avg, memory_usage FROM game_stats WHERE fps_avg > 30 ORDER BY game_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, player_id FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_sessions;
SELECT session_id, game_name, timestamp FROM game_sessions WHERE game_name = 'Chess';
SELECT session_id, player_score FROM gameplay_stats ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, session_id, interaction_type, interaction_duration FROM player_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'chat' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT session_id, SUM(player_score) AS total_score FROM gameplay_stats GROUP BY session_id;
SELECT player_score, enemy_kills, player_health FROM gameplay_stats ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT session_id, game_name, timestamp FROM game_sessions WHERE session_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT * FROM player_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'combat' AND interaction_duration > INTERVAL '30 minutes';
SELECT session_id, AVG(player_score) AS average_score FROM gameplay_stats GROUP BY session_id HAVING COUNT(player_score) > 5;
SELECT * FROM gameplay_stats JOIN game_sessions ON gameplay_stats.session_id = game_sessions.session_id WHERE game_name = 'Mario' ORDER BY player_score DESC
SELECT * FROM GameSessions WHERE player_id = '3173b7c7-73d7-4b6e-924c-4cc3670883e2';
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM GameSessions WHERE player_id = 'a4e297cf-0e66-4727-86e4-46e53d67cc93' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_id, game_name FROM GameSessions WHERE end_time < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PlayerStats WHERE player_level > 5 AND total_score > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_size FROM GameAssets WHERE upload_time > '2021-11-01T12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM GameSessions WHERE player_id = 'f47133d3-06d8-4e96-a6d4-3bcd3b44cba3';
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM GameSessions WHERE game_name = 'Chess' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT player_id, total_score FROM PlayerStats WHERE total_score > 1000 AND player_level >= 5 ORDER BY total_score DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_time FROM GameEvents WHERE event_type = 'achievement' OR event_type = 'mission' ORDER BY event_time;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_size FROM GameAssets WHERE asset_type = 'character' ORDER BY asset_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameSession
SELECT user_id, start_time, duration FROM GameSession ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT player_name, score FROM PlayerStats WHERE score > 100
SELECT * FROM PlayerMovement WHERE session_id = 12345
SELECT * FROM GameSettings WHERE session_id = 54321
SELECT * FROM GameSession ORDER BY session_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, score, health, ammo FROM PlayerStats WHERE health > 50 ORDER BY score DESC, health ASC;
SELECT player_id, session_id, timestamp, position_x, position_y, position_z FROM PlayerMovement WHERE player_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT session_id, graphics_quality, sound_level, controls_scheme FROM GameSettings WHERE sound_level < 50 ORDER BY graphics_quality;
SELECT session_id, fps, gpu_usage, cpu_usage FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE fps > 60 AND cpu_usage < 50 ORDER BY session_id;
